name: I LIKE FISH!
description:
You are a man who really likes fish. One day you stumble upon a bunch of fishermen leaving fish outside of water to drown. You can't stand looking at that sight. Therefore you are going to save them. Steal the fish from the fishermen and don't get caught doing it. 

This game was made in under 72 hours for ludum dare 46 with the theme  "Keep it alive".
